text: avaru kayuttiruvudu, adara (lokantyada kuritada bhavisya vanigala) iderikeyannallade mattenannu? Nijavagi, adara iderikeya dina bandaga, hinde adannu maretiddavaru, ‘‘nam'ma odeyana dutaru khandita satyadondige bandiddaru. (Iga) nam'ma paravagi sipharasu madalu sipharasudararu yaradaru iddareye? Athava navu hinde maduttiddudakkinta bhinnavada karmagalannu maduvantagalu, nam'mannu maralisalaguvude?’’ Ennuvaru. Khanditavagiyu avaru svatah tam'mannu nastakke olapadisikondaru mattu avaru kattikondidda sullugalella avarinda kaledu hodavu
